section.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a person may not record or broadcast any criminal matter, including a trial, hearing, motion, or argument, that is held in trial court or before a grand jury.
This prohibition applies to the use of television, radio, and photographic or recording equipment.

text.section:
Subsection (a) of this section does not apply to the use of electronic or photographic equipment approved by the court:
to take the testimony of a child victim under § 11-303 of this article; or
to perpetuate a court record.
A person who violates this section may be held in contempt of court.
